hazard.name: Evil Spirit(s)
entries: In haunted places, bored or evil spirits try to interact with the living, but not always their methods are appreciated.

{@bold Effect}: At initiative counter 10 randomly choose a creature in the encounter. That creature feels the presence of something unearthly and the next d20 roll is made with disadvantage. A spirit is instantly destroyed by a dispel evil and good spell consumed by touching the spirit, or a remove curse spell casted on it.
{@bold Environment}: desert, grassland, swamp, mountain, arctic, coast

{@bold Sighting}: The spirit can be detected only with magic that can allow to see through the ethereal plane. Other magic or effects that detect undead give uncertain response, as the spirit's aura is not present in the material plane.
